column4: No, you can browse youtube videos from within totem, without a web browser
really?
Yes :)
if i was homosexual, id say i love you
thanks
np
doesnt work man
Works for me on intrepid
everything works for everyone on intrepid, not me though
What happens when you try to play a video?
it works..., lol
okay ill reprhase, sound works, its nice, but flash sound does not work at all
So the totem video plugin works but you still want sound in flash, or does totem's youtube plugin not work for you?
they both share the same symptoms, video plays perfect, no sound however
Are there any apps that play sound?
yes, and they all work
local vids and mp3s work
So local vids play in totem with sound but not vids from totem's youtube plugin?
yes.
That's odd
What happens if you go into /tmp and try to play one of the files that starts with "Flash" while a youtube video page is open in the browser?
nothing, no sound in both totem and firefox
Try running "asoundconf set-pulseaudio" and see if sounds play then ( you may need to stop any programs playing sound for it to start working )
